definition: a depository containing historical records and documents, to put into an archive
details:
noun
- a depository containing historical records and documents
= example: a depository containing historical records and documents
- a single file comprised of metadata and one or more other files, often compressed
= example: a single file comprised of metadata and one or more other files, often compressed
verb
- to put into an archive
= example: to put into an archive
= synonyms: file away
